alert.note: Alert for Boone; Clay; Hendricks; Montgomery; Morgan; Owen; Parke; Putnam; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:55PM EDT until March 31 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Vigo County in west central Indiana... Northern Morgan County in central Indiana... Hendricks County in central Indiana... Northern Clay County in west central Indiana... Northeastern Owen County in west central Indiana... Southeastern Parke County in west central Indiana... Boone County in central Indiana... Putnam County in west central Indiana... Southeastern Montgomery County in west central Indiana... * Until 1145 PM EDT. * At 1055 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Crawfordsville to 9 miles south of Rockville to near Brazil, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Ladoga and New Market around 1100 PM EDT. New Ross around 1105 PM EDT. Jamestown, Advance and Cagles Mill Lake around 1110 PM EDT. Greencastle, Cloverdale and Bainbridge around 1115 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Fillmore, Ulen, Groveland, Carpentersville, Lebanon, Whitestown, Coatesville, Amo, Belle Union, Little Point, Eminence, Zionsville, North Salem, Stilesville, Danville, Monrovia, Clayton, Lizton and Lake Hart. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central and west central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Clay; Hendricks; Montgomery; Morgan; Owen; Parke; Putnam; Vigo
